dailyTip.title: Daily Health Tip
dailyTip.content: Try adding more leafy greens to your meals. They're rich in nutrients and can help regulate blood sugar levels.

chat.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm Hanna™, your personal health assistant. I'm here to help with any questions about diabetes, obesity, nutrition, exercise, or mental wellbeing. How can I assist you today?
chat.disclaimer: This health assistant provides general health information only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice.
